user_query: I want to get historical currency exchange rates for a destination wedding in Bali on August 15th, 2022.

TaskList.description: Query the historical currency exchange rates for USD on August 15th, 2022.
Query the historical currency exchange rates for AUD on August 15th, 2022.
Query the historical currency exchange rates for JPY on August 15th, 2022.
Compile the exchange rates results from steps 1, 2, and 3 into a summary.
